home.title: Hi, I'm Esneider
home.text: Hey, are looking for a web developer to build your Brand and grow your business? Let's shake hands with me.

projects.title: Some of my work
projects.text: As a full stack web developer I have completed some personal projects

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: If you would like to type me a message, fill the form below, I will type you back

projects.name: Workspace Landing
projects.description: Your Swift Solution for Instant, Portable Development Environments! Streamline your coding process with our platform, creating Docker workspaces effortlessly. Perfect for individual or team projects, it offers hassle-free, efficient coding without setup complexities.

projects.name: Encrypt
projects.description: Encrypt employs cutting-edge encryption methods, guaranteeing top-tier data protection. With its intuitive interface, it seamlessly secures your data. Explore detailed encryption options effortlessly, ensuring your digital assets are always shielded from prying eyes.

projects.name: Encrypt Service
projects.description: Encrypt Service offers cutting-edge encryption, empowering developers with top-tier data protection. Its intuitive interface facilitates effortless encryption, ensuring your digital assets remain secure and confidential. Explore customizable encryption options effortlessly, guaranteeing airtight security for your applications.

projects.name: Weather
projects.description: Weather app which consumes an API to get the information and shows it on screen. It has the forecast and it is possible to go on details clicking on each card. Besides, it is possible to search cities or countries and change the temperature unit.

projects.name: Marketing Landing Page
projects.description: Marketing agency which is ficticius and try to show how it would be a landing of a service like this. For this project I used a platform called Webflow which gives you all needed tools to develope webpages with payment integrations, CMS, and eCommerce.

projects.name: Chaira Login
projects.description: This is a proposal for Amazonia University. It has a login which needs some changes asked for by students. So, I decided to make those changes and show this proposal to university (pending state). It is built with ReactJS, Styled Components, and clear architecture.

projects.name: Rick and Morty
projects.description: It is a website which was built with ReactJS and Styled Components. This uses GraphQL to fetch data from an api. User can see characters of Rick and Morty, and can have a history of their appearance. When user clicks on the button it will show a random character.

projects.name: Puppies
projects.description: This app consumes an api which contains information about dogs. User can create dogs and filter and order them by temperament, weight, and alphabetically. It is possible to see what dogs are from API and Data Base. Besides, user can search dog with the search bar.

projects.name: Service Puppie
projects.description: It is service where the Puppies app get the information to show up on screen. It has functions related to CRUD. The technologies used for this service are NodeJS, Sequelize, and JWT. It has clean architecture and scalable.
